Comment: It seems to dangerous to me to add such a binding. People may be in the habit of right- or middle-clicking titlebars just to focus them. Especially the “kill” command is a dangerous one to accidentally trigger.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: I understand that you want to have wide exposure for your feature, but I don’t think we should configure any mouse bindings in the default config (see the specific comments below). Feel free to write an announcement post to i3-discuss so that existing users will get to know the feature. New users will read the userguide and see it there.
